You may need to install fastp. Not sure if this is the right way to do so so don't run for now
```{r, engine='bash'}
# download the latest build
wget http://opengene.org/fastp/fastp
chmod a+x ./fastp

# or download specified version, i.e. fastp v0.23.1
wget http://opengene.org/fastp/fastp.0.23.1
mv fastp.0.23.1 fastp
chmod a+x ./fastp
```

What my QAQC query might look like using fastp.
```{r, engine='bash'}
fastp \
   --in1 ./SRR10352205_1.fastq \
   --in1 ./SRR10352224_1.fastq \
   --in1 ./SRR10352206_1.fastq \
   --in1 ./SRR10352254_1.fastq \
   --in2 ./SRR10352205_2.fastq \
   --in2 ./SRR10352206_2.fastq \
   --in2 ./SRR10352224_2.fastq \
   --in2 ./SRR10352254_2.fastq
```
